name: Pljeskavica
short_description: A beloved Serbian staple, this juicy patty blends minced veal, beef, and pork with a kick of paprika, delivering bold flavors grilled to perfection. Perfect for a hearty meal!

name: Pasulj
short_description: A hearty Serbian staple, Pasulj combines tender white beans with smoky bacon and savory sausage, simmered with onions and carrots for a rich, comforting flavor. Perfect for warming up on chilly days!

name: Slatko
short_description: Originating from Serbia, this delightful fruit preserve features whole pieces of fruit, like quinces, immersed in a luscious, thick syrup. Each spoonful bursts with sweetness, making it a beloved treat for special occasions.

name: Makovnjača
short_description: A beloved Serbian sweet bread, layers of soft dough embrace a rich poppy seed filling, often enhanced with raisins and a hint of citrus. Perfectly baked, it offers a delightful contrast of textures and flavors.

name: Gibanica
short_description: Layers of crispy phyllo envelop rich cottage cheese and tangy sour cream in this beloved Serbian pastry. A comforting delight, gibanica is perfect for sharing at family gatherings.

name: Proja / Projara
short_description: Originating from Serbia, this hearty cornbread blends cornmeal with milk, eggs, and butter for a rich, savory flavor. Often enjoyed warm, it makes a perfect companion to hearty stews and soups.

name: Prebranac
short_description: Originating from Serbia, this comforting baked bean dish combines tender beans with caramelized onions and rich Hungarian paprika. The result is a savory delight, slightly dry and bursting with flavor.

name: Burek sa sirom
short_description: Golden, flaky layers envelop a creamy filling of cottage cheese and eggs in this beloved Serbian pastry. Each bite offers a delightful crunch, followed by rich, savory goodness—perfect for any occasion.

name: Sarma
short_description: Tender cabbage or grape leaves cradle a savory blend of beef, lamb, and pork, creating a hearty and comforting dish that showcases the rich culinary heritage of Serbia. Each bite bursts with flavor, steeped in tradition and warmth.

name: Karađorđeva šnicla
short_description: A beloved Serbian classic, tender veal or pork cutlet is stuffed with rich kajmak, rolled in crispy breadcrumbs, and fried to golden perfection. Indulge in its savory layers and cultural heritage!

name: Skewers (Ražnjići)
short_description: Grilled to perfection, these flavorful skewers showcase a mouthwatering mix of beef, lamb, chicken, and pork, seasoned with vibrant paprika. A beloved Balkan treat, ražnjići are a must-try for meat lovers.

name: Urnebes
short_description: Originating from Serbia, this creamy spread blends fresh cheese, garlic, and roasted bell peppers, elevated with a sprinkle of paprika. Perfectly savory, it enhances any meal with its rich, zesty flavors.

name: Pihtije
short_description: Originating from Serbia, pihtije features tender pork simmered with aromatic onions, carrots, and bay leaves, creating a rich and savory gelatinous dish that's perfect for festive gatherings.

name: Krofne
short_description: Deep-fried to golden perfection, these Serbian doughnuts are soft and airy, filled with sweet delights. Krofne are a beloved treat, embodying a rich cultural tradition and indulgent flavor.

name: Komplet lepinja
short_description: Traditional Serbian lepinja is split and slathered in rich kaymak, topped with a perfectly baked egg, and finished with savory dripping. A hearty breakfast that embodies local flavors and culture!

name: Podvarak
short_description: A beloved Serbian comfort dish, sauerkraut blends with savory roasted pork and fragrant garlic, creating a hearty and warming meal perfect for chilly days.

name: Sataraš
short_description: A beloved Serbian staple, this vibrant vegetable stew combines sautéed tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, and garlic, simmered to perfection and finished with fresh parsley. Each spoonful bursts with rich, comforting flavors.

name: Popara
short_description: A beloved Serbian breakfast, Popara combines soft bread soaked in warm milk and tea, enriched with creamy butter and savory lard. This hearty dish transforms leftovers into a comforting family meal.

name: Gomboce
short_description: Plum-filled dumplings from Serbia, Gomboce feature a tender potato dough enveloping sweet, tart plums. Rolled in breadcrumbs, they offer a delightful contrast of textures and flavors in every bite.

name: Slatko od jagoda
short_description: A beloved Serbian delicacy, slatko od jagoda features sweet, ripe strawberries simmered in sugar syrup until they reach a luscious, velvety consistency. Traditionally enjoyed with bread, it captures the essence of summer in every spoonful.

name: Reform torta
short_description: A beloved Serbian dessert, this multi-layered cake features a nutty walnut sponge paired with a luxuriously creamy chocolate filling. Rich and indulgent, it’s perfect for special occasions.

name: Leskovački roštilj
short_description: Originating from Leskovac, this Serbian barbecue showcases expertly grilled meats marinated with smoky paprika and spices, delivering bold flavors that celebrate the region's rich culinary heritage.

name: Lenja pita
short_description: A beloved Serbian treat, Lenja pita layers delicate biscuits with luscious fruit, creamy cheese, or nut filling. Its simplicity and rich flavors make it a comforting dessert enjoyed across generations.

name: Svadbarski kupus
short_description: Originating from Serbian weddings, this hearty stew features tender meats simmered with sour cabbage, vibrant paprika, and aromatic spices. Each spoonful offers a rich, comforting burst of flavor that celebrates tradition.

name: Čorbast pasulj
short_description: Rich and hearty, this Serbian stew combines soaked beans with onions, carrots, and smoked meat, simmered to perfection. Each bowl offers a comforting taste of tradition and rustic flavor.

name: Srpska salata
short_description: A vibrant staple of Serbian cuisine, this fresh salad bursts with the flavors of ripe tomatoes, crisp cucumbers, and sweet peppers, all drizzled with fragrant sunflower oil. Enjoy its refreshing crunch as a perfect side dish!

name: Fish paprikash (Fiš paprikaš)
short_description: A beloved Serbian staple, this spicy fish stew simmers with carp, catfish, and northern pike, infused with rich paprika and hot peppers. Cooked in a cauldron over an open fire, it embodies warmth and tradition.

name: Leskovački voz
short_description: Originating from Leskovac, Serbia, this vibrant barbecue feast features an array of grilled meats, rich in smoky flavors and spices, served alongside fresh sides for a truly satisfying experience.

name: Krvavice
short_description: Savory and rich, these Serbian blood sausages combine pork offal, pig’s blood, and earthy buckwheat, creating a hearty dish steeped in tradition and flavor. Enjoy them grilled or sautéed for a true taste of local culture.

name: Leskovačka mućkalica
short_description: Originating from the vibrant region of Leskovac, this hearty dish combines tender grilled pork with peppers, tomatoes, and spices, creating a smoky, flavorful delight that's a celebrated Serbian comfort food.

name: Belolučene paprike
short_description: Roasted bell peppers infused with garlic and tangy vinegar create a vibrant Serbian salad, beloved for its fresh flavors and simplicity. A sprinkle of parsley adds a touch of herbaceous charm.

name: Pazarske mantije
short_description: Originating from Novi Pazar, these savory spheres burst with the rich flavors of spiced minced meat and are enveloped in delicate dough. Baked to golden perfection, they offer a delightful twist on traditional pastries.

name: Lepinja
short_description: Yeast-raised and delightfully spongy, this Balkan flatbread captures the essence of Serbian cuisine. Warm and pillowy, lepinja is perfect for scooping up hearty stews or grilled meats.

name: Slatko od kajsija
short_description: Serbian slatko od kajsija captures summer's essence with tender, simmered apricots in a sweet sugar syrup, often enjoyed as a traditional welcome treat, celebrating hospitality and flavor.

name: Vasina torta
short_description: Originating from Serbia, this beloved classic features a rich walnut sponge layered with a velvety filling of chocolate and zesty oranges, all crowned with fluffy šaum. Indulge in its delightful harmony of flavors!

name: Bela čorba
short_description: A Serbian comfort food staple, Bela čorba features tender chicken, creamy eggs, and hearty potatoes simmered to perfection. Its rich, velvety texture and aromatic herbs make it a warming delight.
